About this site

Travis Nowak is an Honours Finance student currently in his final year at the University of Alberta.

He has a keen interest in capital markets and brings experience in a wide array of industries including Asset Management, Economic Policy, and Equity Research where he currently works.

His current focus is to take insights from data science, which he has recently picked up, and apply them to M&A and Private Equity.
